channel.title: Project Idea -> RS Client Wiki
channel.description: Im not sure if this has been done before but my idea was to create a Wiki into which we could store what we know about the rs client, i.e-> getCameraCurve and all of those methods and like keep an archive on how it has changed throughout the releases and stuff. This shared knowledge would make using the client way easier, just wanted to know what you guys thought.

item.title: Project Idea -> RS Client Wiki
item.dc:creator: @RsN RsN
item.description:
@RsN wrote:

Yakman, now that you put it that way, I believe this would be a bad idea, thats why i posted anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Idea -> RS Client Wiki
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

well IMO this isnt a good idea, cause people would just end up knowing less
Iv always thought the best way to find out about the classes and stuff is to get a deob and start looking around, use eclipse’s renamer, also looking at the old aryan deobs.
you also get some hints from watching what other people write, like once silver lining mentioned about login index, and i didnt know about it before, and i dont think i would have known just by looking at deobs.

all in all, i think its better if people just do it themselves

Read full topic

item.title: Project Idea -> RS Client Wiki
item.dc:creator: @RsN RsN
item.description:
@RsN wrote:

well that was a small example, I know that the name changes thats just a part, but what I really mean is like description of the classes, how they interact, how they have changed, and if possible a log of the classes names that have been throughout the updater. But I guess its not such a good idea anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Project Idea -> RS Client Wiki
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

…

The only thing that really changes is the names
But we already have plebs posting their outputs in the forums. I don’t think an entire wiki is needed.

Read full topic
